title: Haddabat
text: Haddabat () is a village in northern <a href="Aleppo%20Governorate">Aleppo Governorate</a>, northwestern Syria. Located some east of <a href="al-Rai%2C%20Syria">Al-Rai</a> and less than from the <a href="Syria%E2%80%93Turkey%20border">border with Turkey</a>, it is administratively part of <a href="Nahiya%20al-Rai">Nahiya al-Rai</a> in <a href="al-Bab%20District">al-Bab District</a>. In the 2004 census, Haddabat had a population of 387.
